bug.author: vedpd
bug.summary: Zero division error observed on doing pandas profiling, version of pandas profiling : 1.4.1
bug.description:
I am still getting the error for zero division, was the fix merged in : 1.4.1 version? below is the error observed : - import pandas_profiling internet = pd.read_csv("internet_data.csv") pandas_profiling.ProfileReport(internet) <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pandas-profiling/pandas-profiling/files/3647746/Internet_data.zip>Internet_data.zip</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
ZeroDivisionError Traceback (most recent call last) in ----> 1 pandas_profiling.ProfileReport(internet) ~\AppData\Local\Continuum\anaconda3\lib\site-packages\pandas_profiling_init_.py in init(self, df, **kwargs) 67 68 self.html = to_html(sample, ---> 69 description_set) 70 71 self.description_set = description_set ~\AppData\Local\Continuum\anaconda3\lib\site-packages\pandas_profiling\report.py in to_html(sample, stats_object) 192 193 # Add plot of matrix correlation --> 194 pearson_matrix = plot.correlation_matrix(stats_object['correlations']['pearson'], 'Pearson') 195 spearman_matrix = plot.correlation_matrix(stats_object['correlations']['spearman'], 'Spearman') 196 correlations_html = templates.template('correlations').render( ~\AppData\Local\Continuum\anaconda3\lib\site-packages\pandas_profiling\plot.py in correlation_matrix(corrdf, title, **kwargs) 134 plt.title(title, size=18) 135 plt.colorbar(matrix_image) --> 136 axes_cor.set_xticks(np.arange(0, corrdf.shape[0], corrdf.shape[0] * 1.0 / len(labels))) 137 axes_cor.set_yticks(np.arange(0, corrdf.shape[1], corrdf.shape[1] * 1.0 / len(labels))) 138 axes_cor.set_xticklabels(labels, rotation=90) ZeroDivisionError: float division by zero

comments.comment: Please update your version to the latest version (2.3.0). If you want to stick to the 1.x.y release, you could try 1.4.3. There is no support for these older versions however.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/sbrugman>@sbrugman</denchmark-link>
I updated it to version 2.3.0, now the profile result is not getting embedded in my ipython notebook. Is there any solution to this?
